name: Little Wizards: NES Style Game
description:
Info

Made by DevNugget on YouTube!!

Play as a little wizard and beat platformer levels by destroying enemies and collecting stars, all with a blast from the past!!

Please note that the levels are short for now but I might make them longer after the voting period!

Controls

UP in the NES con = W = Jump

Down in the NES con = S 

Right in the NES con = D = Walk Right

Left in the NES con = A = Walk Left

A button in the NES con = X = Shoot

NOTE: if the menu bugs out use your mouse to select
